name: S. Cargo
storyline: Cargo lives on a quiet island, working as a postsnail. She is excellent at her job. She has been known to sleep in a little, but no one really expects fast deliveries. Life is good — until one day, when things start disappearing from the island. Now she must take part in a desperate race to get back the things that were stolen.
summary: A short adventure game, S. Cargo is about a little postsnail on her quest to find the disappearing belongings of the islanders. You'll meet several colorful other creatures and find a few secret around as you explore and solve a few puzzles. It can be found for download on the official website by Smidgen, as well as an open source version on GitHub.

videos.name: Dev Diary
videos.title: Cargo Demo: Starting a New Game
